mapper.select: select num, title, content, ownerid, ownername, createdate, isdelete from bbs where isdelete = 'N' and num=#{num}
mapper.insert: insert into bbs(title, content, ownerid, ownername, createdate) value(#{title},#{content},#{ownerid}, #{ownername}, #{createdate})
mapper.delete: update bbs set isdelete='Y' where num=#{num}
